constituent: adjusted, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly, two, fenceposts, cabers
koohiiStory1: The Scotsman goalkeeper adjusted himself. He reached down and adjusted the two things between his skinny fencepost legs.
koohiiStory2: HINT: this kanji as a primitive can mean goalkeeper. The "fence posts" are goalposts, and the two goalkeepers wear plaid uniforms (this kanji also means uniform as in even), making them uniform with each other and distinguishing them as goalkeepers from the rest of the team.
kunYomi: そろ.う、ひと.しい、ひと.しく、あたる、はやい
